verses.verse: Who is this that cometh <WH935> <WH8802> from Edom <WH123>, with dyed <WH2556> <WH8803> garments <WH899> from Bozrah <WH1224>? this that is glorious <WH1921> <WH8803> in his apparel <WH3830>, travelling <WH6808> <WH8802> in the greatness <WH7230> of his strength <WH3581>? I that speak <WH1696> <WH8764> in righteousness <WH6666>, mighty <WH7227> to save <WH3467> <WH8687>.
Wherefore art thou red <WH122> in thine apparel <WH3830>, and thy garments <WH899> like him that treadeth <WH1869> <WH8802> in the winefat <WH1660> ?

I have trodden <WH1869> <WH8804> the winepress <WH6333> alone; and of the people <WH5971> there was none <WH376> with me: for I will tread <WH1869> <WH8799> them in mine anger <WH639>, and trample <WH7429> <WH8799> them in my fury <WH2534>; and their blood <WH5332> shall be sprinkled <WH5137> <WH8799> upon my garments <WH899>, and I will stain <WH1351> <WH8689> all my raiment <WH4403>.
For the day <WH3117> of vengeance <WH5359> is in mine heart <WH3820>, and the year <WH8141> of my redeemed <WH1350> <WH8803> is come <WH935> <WH8804>.

And I looked <WH5027> <WH8686>, and there was none to help <WH5826> <WH8802>; and I wondered <WH8074> <WH8709> that there was none to uphold <WH5564> <WH8802>: therefore mine own arm <WH2220> brought salvation <WH3467> <WH8686> unto me; and my fury <WH2534>, it upheld <WH5564> <WH8804> me.

And I will tread down <WH947> <WH8799> the people <WH5971> in mine anger <WH639>, and make them drunk <WH7937> <WH8762> in my fury <WH2534>, and I will bring down <WH3381> <WH8686> their strength <WH5332> to the earth <WH776>.

I will mention <WH2142> <WH8686> the lovingkindnesses <WH2617> of the YY <WH3068>, and the praises <WH8416> of the YY <WH3068>, according to all that the YY <WH3068> hath bestowed <WH1580> <WH8804> on us, and the great <WH7227> goodness <WH2898> toward the house <WH1004> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, which he hath bestowed <WH1580> <WH8804> on them according to his mercies <WH7356>, and according to the multitude <WH7230> of his lovingkindnesses <WH2617>.
For he said <WH559> <WH8799>, Surely they are my people <WH5971>, children <WH1121> that will not lie <WH8266> <WH8762>: so he was their Saviour <WH3467> <WH8688>.

In all their affliction <WH6869> he was afflicted <WH6862>, and the angel <WH4397> of his presence <WH6440> saved <WH3467> <WH8689> them: in his love <WH160> and in his pity <WH2551> he redeemed <WH1350> <WH8804> them; and he bare <WH5190> <WH8762> them, and carried <WH5375> <WH8762> them all the days <WH3117> of old <WH5769>.

But they rebelled <WH4784> <WH8804>, and vexed <WH6087> <WH8765> his holy <WH6944> Spirit <WH7307>: therefore he was turned <WH2015> <WH8735> to be their enemy <WH341> <WH8802>, and he fought <WH3898> <WH8738> against them.

Then he remembered <WH2142> <WH8799> the days <WH3117> of old <WH5769>, Mosheh <WH4872>, and his people <WH5971>, saying, Where is he that brought them up <WH5927> <WH8688> out of the sea <WH3220> with the shepherd <WH7462> <WH8802> of his flock <WH6629>? where is he that put <WH7760> <WH8802> his holy <WH6944> Spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> him?

That led <WH3212> <WH8688> them by the right hand <WH3225> of Mosheh <WH4872> with his glorious <WH8597> arm <WH2220>, dividing <WH1234> <WH8802> the water <WH4325> before <WH6440> them, to make <WH6213> <WH8800> himself an everlasting <WH5769> name <WH8034> ?
That led <WH3212> <WH8688> them through the deep <WH8415>, as an horse <WH5483> in the wilderness <WH4057>, that they should not stumble <WH3782> <WH8735> ?

As a beast <WH929> goeth down <WH3381> <WH8799> into the valley <WH1237>, the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> caused him to rest <WH5117> <WH8686>: so didst thou lead <WH5090> <WH8765> thy people <WH5971>, to make <WH6213> <WH8800> thyself a glorious <WH8597> name <WH8034>.

Look down <WH5027> <WH8685> from heaven <WH8064>, and behold <WH7200> <WH8798> from the habitation <WH2073> of thy holiness <WH6944> and of thy glory <WH8597>: where is thy zeal <WH7068> and thy strength <WH1369>, the sounding <WH1995> of thy bowels <WH4578> and of thy mercies <WH7356> toward me? are they restrained <WH662> <WH8694> ?

Doubtless <WH3588> thou art our father <WH1>, though Avraham <WH85> be ignorant <WH3808> <WH3045> <WH8804> of us, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> acknowledge <WH5234> <WH8686> us not: thou, O YY <WH3068>, art our father <WH1>, our redeemer <WH1350> <WH8802>; thy name <WH8034> is from everlasting <WH5769>.

O YY <WH3068>, why hast thou made us to err <WH8582> <WH8686> from thy ways <WH1870>, and hardened <WH7188> <WH8686> our heart <WH3820> from thy fear <WH3374>? Return <WH7725> <WH8798> for thy servants <WH5650> ' sake, the tribes <WH7626> of thine inheritance <WH5159>.
The people <WH5971> of thy holiness <WH6944> have possessed <WH3423> <WH8804> it but a little while <WH4705>: our adversaries <WH6862> have trodden down <WH947> <WH8790> thy sanctuary <WH4720>.
We are thine: thou never <WH5769> barest rule <WH4910> <WH8804> over them; they were not called <WH7121> <WH8738> by thy name <WH8034>.
